content:
Yes, several James Bond movies have performed well in Asian markets over the years. China is a relatively new market for James Bond films, but it has become increasingly important in recent years, as the country's cinema industry has grown rapidly.

Some of the highest-grossing James Bond movies in Asian markets, including China, are:

1. Skyfall (2012)
2. Spectre (2015)
3. Die Another Day (2002)
4. Tomorrow Never Dies (1997)
5. Casino Royale (2006)

Overall, the James Bond franchise has been one of the most successful and enduring movie franchises in history, and it has a massive global following. The films are known for their adrenaline-fueled action, exotic locations, and of course, the charismatic and suave James Bond character.
